scripts.check-formatting: prettier -c './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc && poetry run isort . --check && poetry run yapf -rd yt_dlp-stubs/*/*.pyi yt_dlp-stubs/*.pyi
scripts.format: prettier -w './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc && poetry run isort . && poetry run yapf -ri yt_dlp-stubs/*/*.pyi yt_dlp-stubs/*.pyi
scripts.qa: yarn pylint && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
